document_data.name: Zilchyn Q'Leptin
document_data.mainbody: '''Zilchyn Q'Leptin''', or simply '''Zilch''', was a [[drow]] [[wizard]] from [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Zilchyn was a kleptomaniac. This behavior increased with the arrival of the [[demon lord]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], he stole some [[spell component]]s and was discovered. He fled the city, losing his [[spellbook]], and had an encounter with a [[black pudding]] that gave him many scars over the left part of his body. Zilchyn finally arrived in [[Mantol-Derith]], where he hoped to begin a new life.
